messages.content: Sure, I'd be happy to help you play a game! What kind of game are you looking to play?
Can you play a game with points?
Yes, I can play a game with points. What kind of game are you looking to play?
Can you play a game that I invented, that has points?

Sure, I can help you play a game that you invented! Let's name the game "Point Break." In this game, players are points, and players can take turns moving forward in time. They can make a move by taking a step forward, or they can stay where they are by taking no steps. The goal of the game is to reach the end of the game by having all of their points used up. When a player reaches the end of the game, they are promoted to a higher level.

What are some of the rules of the game? Can you give me a brief description of how the game works?
